description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Fix the issue of freezing caused by modifying key layout before it is fully loaded  
2. Allow disabling controller mapping in the in-game side menu  
3. Fix issues related to local installation and updates of Cleanroom  
4. Allow enabling the option to disable mod compatibility checks in settings

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复键位布局未加载完成时修改造成卡死的问题
2.允许在游戏右侧菜单内禁用手柄映射
3.修复本地安装升级 Cleanroom 相关问题
4.允许在设置内启用不检查模组兼容性
